languages.text: "Вот она. Салис Прайм. Место моего поражения... нет, не так! Место испытания, которое мне еще надлежит пройти", {n}— голос Ардженты дрожит от эмоций.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вот она. Салис Прайм. Место моего поражения... нет, не так! Место испытания, которое мне еще надлежит пройти", {n}— голос Ардженты дрожит от эмоций.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

languages.text: 「それだ。サリス・プライム。我が敗北を喫した場所…いや、そういうわけじゃない！我が試練を乗り越える場所なのだ」{n}アルジェンタの声は感情的で震えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それだ。サリス・プライム。我が敗北を喫した場所…いや、そういうわけじゃない！我が試練を乗り越える場所なのだ」{n}アルジェンタの声は感情的で震えていた。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “就是这里，萨利斯主星。这里就是我惨败而归的地方……不，不是这样！这里就是我必将战胜试炼的地方。”{n}阿洁塔的声音颤抖着，充满了激情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “就是这里，萨利斯主星。这里就是我惨败而归的地方……不，不是这样！这里就是我必将战胜试炼的地方。”{n}阿洁塔的声音颤抖着，充满了激情。{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Nous y sommes. Salis Primus. Le lieu de ma défaite... mais non, voyons ! Il s'agit au contraire du temple sacré où je suis appelée à être jugée. » {n}La voix d'Argenta tremble sous le coup de l'émotion.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Nous y sommes. Salis Primus. Le lieu de ma défaite... mais non, voyons ! Il s'agit au contraire du temple sacré où je suis appelée à être jugée. » {n}La voix d'Argenta tremble sous le coup de l'émotion.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Aquí estamos. Salis Prime. El lugar donde fui derrotada... ¡No, no es así! Es el lugar donde superaré mi prueba». {n}La voz de Argenta tiembla por la emoción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Aquí estamos. Salis Prime. El lugar donde fui derrotada... ¡No, no es así! Es el lugar donde superaré mi prueba». {n}La voz de Argenta tiembla por la emoción.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sind da. Salis Prime. Der Ort, an dem ich meine Niederlage erlitt ... nein, das stimmt überhaupt nicht! Der Ort, an dem ich meine Prüfung bestehen werde." {n}Argentas Stimme ist emotional und zittert.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind da. Salis Prime. Der Ort, an dem ich meine Niederlage erlitt ... nein, das stimmt überhaupt nicht! Der Ort, an dem ich meine Prüfung bestehen werde." {n}Argentas Stimme ist emotional und zittert.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "İşte burası. Salis Prime. Yenilgiyi tattığım yer... Hayır, bu doğru değil. Burası, imtihanımı geçeceğim yer." {n}Argenta'nın sesi, duygularının yoğunluğuyla titriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is it. Salis Prime. The place where I suffered my defeat... no, that's not right at all! It's the place where I am to pass my trial." {n}Argenta's voice is emotional, trembling.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "İşte burası. Salis Prime. Yenilgiyi tattığım yer... Hayır, bu doğru değil. Burası, imtihanımı geçeceğim yer." {n}Argenta'nın sesi, duygularının yoğunluğuyla titriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
